page.title: 04ERMINE STREET
page.content: This area of{Ermine Street}begins at Rush Green roundabout , Hertford . It begins as a narrow overgrown footpath ,until it reaches a farm.The track follows the farmyard wall. A stile is at the end of the path. The track disapears though two open fields,but appears again soon .The track becomes wider ,and the enviroment becomes residential with modern houses. At the Townshend Arms Pub,Ermine street becomes the London road.On one side,there are allotments and fields , the other a mixture of old and modern buildings .The track begins again behind Hertford Heath Moters,near the Crown Pub. A wide dirty track through Forest Commision land ,busy trees arch over the road.This track was tarmaced,yet uneven. The road comes to some modern houses at a Radio mast.
